title: Google Sheets Connection
description: OAuth-based integration with Google Sheets for spreadsheet data synchronization and automation

x-specs.title: Create Google Sheets connection with valid OAuth credentials
x-specs.given: valid Google Sheets OAuth client ID and secret from Google Sheets developer console
x-specs.when: user creates a new Google Sheets connection
x-specs.then: connection is created successfully and OAuth flow can be initiated

x-specs.title: Update Google Sheets connection name
x-specs.when: user updates connection name to a valid unique value
